brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts the DCE router, R1, connected to the D T E router, R2. The show controllers command is issued on R1. The following line is highlighted in the show command output:

R1# show controllers s0/0/1
DCE V.35, clock rate 56000

The show controllers command is issued on R2. The following line is highlighted in the show command output:

R2# show controllers s0/0/1
D T E V.35 TX and RX clocks detected
